overview_description.description: Persistent Energy Partners (PEP) focuses on providing off-grid households with access to basic energy services: electric light, mobile phone charging, fans, radios, TV and Internet.  PEP has invested in and incubated businesses with a commercial approach to providing such energy services to low-income customers in sub-Saharan Africa.
